      • getMoney

        public int[] getMoney(java.lang.String playerName)
               throws DatabaseException
        Given a playerName. Returns as an array, the amount of Gold, Silver and Bronze a player currently holds. E.g. [1000],[59],[20] where each element represents Gold, Silver and Bronze respectively
        Parameters:
        playerID -
        Returns:
        int[3] array of Gold, Silver and Bronze.
        Throws:
        DatabaseException
